title: XML Directory Endpoints
description: Create FastAPI endpoints to serve Cisco IP Phone XML directory with three-level hierarchy (main → group → contact). Completed January 7, 2026.

title: Database Setup
description: Set up SQLite database with SQLAlchemy ORM and Alembic migrations. Define database schema for contacts, phone numbers, and sync state. Completed January 4, 2025.

title: Incremental Sync Implementation
description: Implement incremental synchronization using sync tokens to efficiently update only changed contacts since last sync. Completed January 7, 2026.

title: Test Infrastructure & Coverage Verification
description: Set up pytest infrastructure with shared fixtures, coverage verification, and configuration. Does NOT include writing unit tests.

title: OAuth 2.0 Implementation
description: Implement OAuth 2.0 authentication flow with Google including token storage, automatic token refresh, and web interface for OAuth setup. Completed January 6, 2026.

title: End-to-End Tests
description: Create E2E tests using Playwright for browser automation and complete user flow testing across the application.

title: Google API Client
description: Create wrapper around Google People API client with pagination, error handling, rate limiting, and retry logic. Completed January 6, 2026.

title: Full Sync Implementation
description: Implement initial full synchronization of contacts from Google with pagination, batch processing, and sync token storage. Completed January 6, 2025.

title: Search Service Implementation
description: Implement full-text search service using SQLite FTS5 for fast contact search by name and phone number.

title: Configuration Management
description: Set up configuration management using Pydantic Settings for type-safe, environment-based configuration with .env file support. Completed January 6, 2025.

title: Search API Endpoints
description: Create RESTful search endpoints with pagination, filtering, and response formatting for contact search.

title: Deployment Preparation
description: Prepare for production deployment with Docker, docker-compose, Nginx reverse proxy, and SSL/TLS configuration.

title: Sync Management Interface
description: Create Vue 3 sync management interface with real-time status updates, manual sync triggers, and sync history display.

title: Sync Service Orchestration
description: Create unified sync service with progress tracking, sync locking, statistics, history, and optional background scheduling. Completed January 7, 2026.

title: Phone Number Normalization
description: Implement phone number normalization to E.164 format using phonenumbers library for consistent search and storage.

title: Contact Data Models
description: Define Pydantic schemas for Google API response parsing and internal contact representation with transformation logic. Completed January 6, 2026.

title: Contacts Directory with Integrated Search
description: Create Vue 3 contacts directory view with integrated real-time search, grid/list views, and alphabetical filtering (~2400 lines).

title: Frontend Framework Setup
description: Set up Vue 3 + Vite + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS with Vue Router, API client, and integration with FastAPI backend. Completed January 7, 2026.

title: OAuth Setup Interface
description: Create Vue 3 interface for OAuth setup with connection wizard, status display, and token management using Composition API + TypeScript.

title: XML Formatter Service
description: Create service to format contact data into Cisco IP Phone XML format with proper structure, soft keys, and help messages. Completed January 7, 2026.

title: Monitoring and Logging
description: Set up monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana, plus structured logging for production observability.

title: Integration Tests
description: Create integration tests using FastAPI TestClient for component integration, API workflows, and end-to-end scenarios.

title: API Documentation
description: Create comprehensive API documentation using OpenAPI/Swagger with examples and Postman collection.
